casebody.data:
Mitchell DEESSO
v.
Robert LITZIE, Jr. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 28, 2017

Jeremy C. Virgil and Denise A. Krall, in support of the petition.

The plaintiffs petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn. App. 787, 163 A.3d 55 (2017), is denied.
